document_notes.text:
This update for libostree fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2014-9862: Fixed arbitrary write on heap vulnerability (bsc#1201770).

notes.text: Integer signedness error in bspatch.c in bspatch in bsdiff, as used in Apple OS X before 10.11.6 and other products, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) via a crafted patch file.
